Container.Name: Sharewarez
Container.Overview:
SharewareZ transforms any game folder into a dynamic, searchable library. With IGDB integration, it indexes games and adds cover images, screenshots, and metadata for easy filtering. Plus, you can invite friends to download games from your library.
Requirements: - Postgres database run as a seprate container. - IGDB API Keys (https://api-docs.igdb.com/#getting-started)
Make sure to add the admin’s email to the INITIAL_WHITELIST for your admin account! This will be the only email address that can register the first account. The first account is automatically admin.

Config.Name: Data Folder Warez
Config.Description: This is the folder that contains your game libraries. You can add additional custom library paths on your own.

Config.Name: Data Folder Imagez
Config.Description: Completely optional. Use it if you want to access the images folder.

Config.Name: Initial Admin Email
Config.Description: Only email that can register an admin account.

Config.Name: IGDB API Endpoint
Config.Description: API Address for IGDB. You do not need to change this.

Config.Name: Mail Use TLS
Config.Description: True or False to use TLS.

Config.Name: Zip Files
Config.Description: Folder that contains zip files. Completely optional.

Config.Name: Themes Folder
Config.Description: Themes folder for custom themes. Recommended but not required.

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: This key is used for securing session cookies, it's important you have your own unique key here. Just put 32 (for instance) random characters there.
